body.name: Naetxoa 64G Retro Video Game Console, Wireless Handheld Game Console,20000+ Classic Game, 2.4G Wireless Controllers, 9 Emulator Consoles

features: Retro Game Stick - 20000+ carefully selected retro games on a 64GB TF card with over 9 emulators installed, offering more powerful features, clearer image quality and smoother operation, support for game search function and the ability to save/read game records. Supports 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit and 128-bit emulators.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makes you Step into nostalgia, Its classic design and extensive library of beloved titles, including Mario and Sonic, deliver an authentic retro gaming experience. With precise controls, seamless emulation, and HDMI compatibility, it's perfect for veterans and newcomers alike. Quick load times, save states, and multiplayer support enhance gameplay. Versatile and reliable, this console is a must-have for anyone with a love for retro gaming. From reliving childhood favorites to discovering hidden gems, the Retro Gaming Console offers endless hours of timeless fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Easy to set up, comes with 2 wireless controllers, 20,000 different games
reviews.reviewText: Overall a great gift idea, lots of fun for all members of the family, thousands of games available, some are very simple and old school, others are more complex for experienced gamers. Firestick type device plugs into any open HDMI port, connects wirelessly to two joystick remotes so two people can play. Overall a fun item, you will never get bored trying the many many games to play. A great Holiday gift. Recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nostalgic gaming bliss
reviews.reviewText: The Naetxoa 64G Retro Video Game Console is a trip down memory lane with modern convenience. Boasting 20000+ classic games and 2.4G wireless controllers, it's a gamer's paradise. The inclusion of 9 emulator consoles ensures a diverse and enjoyable gaming experience. The wireless handheld design adds to the comfort, making it easy to relive the joy of classic games. This console effortlessly combines nostalgia with modern features, offering endless hours of retro gaming bliss. A must-have for anyone craving the magic of iconic video games in a convenient and stylish package.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tons of favorite Games
reviews.reviewText: This game console is a really good time pass for my kids, it have the games that they like. on weekends, they never get bored because there are thousands of games to play and free of ads. The picture quality is also good. we really enjoyed playing all together. very easy to setup and without too many wires and adapters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t get over it.
reviews.reviewText: Lived this product. Easy to use and setup.Lots of game to play with. One of recommended product from my side

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is so awesome! It has a ridiculous amount of games, already loaded, and I love that it is wireless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Old School Originals
reviews.reviewText: It's old school games that I can enjoy with my kids. Ease to connecting devices. It brings back the good times when video games were in arcades. My kids love it. We played multiple players together and enjoyed donkey Kong, millipede, galactic, frogger and others. They are atari and Sega games that are no longer available. Not as many graphics as newer video games, however, I really enjoyed and will continue to enjoy these video games that I've missed. It gets 4 stars because I have to push start on 2nd player remote in order to play 2 people.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We were extremely happy with the easy installation, and the number of games is great ! We got this as a game for my dad since he wanted to play mario and other retro games, and could not be happier with the quality !
